summary: The *Transformers* movies are sci-fi action films about robots. Michael Bay directed the first five films, with the sixth and seventh directed by Travis Knight and Steven Caple Jr., respectively. The series has been a box office success, with two films earning over $1 billion each. Critics haven't loved them, but *Bumblebee* (2018) received positive reviews. The films are based on the popular *Transformers* toys and franchise. A crossover with *G.I. Joe* is coming soon.
title: Transformers (film series)
